title: Kulonjarat Raw & Vegan Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering
description: A 100% vegan restaurant serving both raw and cooked food using mostly organic ingredients, and when possible from local farmers. Daily menu and other daily options, fresh juices and green smoothies. No artificial and commercial ingredients. Artisan high quality coffee with made-in-house sprouted almond milk and teas. Family-friendly equipped with playing corner, and child friendly washroom. Relaxing atmosphere with music. For bigger parties will arrange catering out of opening hours too; please inquire.
